an4.82:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.82:4.3: They use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless.
an4.82:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.82:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.82:5.3: They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless.
an4.82:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
